alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 5:29PM CDT until May 05 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern St. Tammany Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Pearl River County in southern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bush, or 12 miles northwest of Picayune, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Picayune, Sun and Bush. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 8 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
